column13: Incoming waste loads at Cleanaway are meticulously managed through a 'weighbridge' system, a critical component of our waste management processes. This system serves a dual purpose: first, to ensure strict adherence to our operational licenses, guaranteeing that the types of waste accepted align with regulatory standards. Second, the weighbridge verifies that the weight of each incoming load complies with the terms outlined in our contracts with customers.

column13: The parental policy allows employees who are primary carers to take 18 weeks of leave, regardless of gender, with eligibility from the commencement of employment with Cleanaway. Secondary carers can now also take two weeks of leave at full pay. The policy also provides employees who experience miscarriage or stillbirth paid leave as well as additional support.
